What if a person could print a temporary, self-destructing tattoo on their skin?
A person could print a temporary, edible, and nutritious food product that changes flavor and texture based on their emotions.
A person could print a temporary, augmented reality (AR) mask that changes the way they perceive their surroundings.
A person could print a temporary, shape-shifting material that can change color, texture, and form to match their surroundings.
A person could print a temporary, bioluminescent skin that glows with a unique, personalized pattern.
